# Ex09 Event Registration Web Application
## Date:06-10-2025

## AIM:
To design, develop and deploy a web application for event registration.

## DESIGN STEPS:

### Step 1:
Create a new frame.

### Step 2:
Select any one preset size of your choice.

### Step 3:
Select the shapes you need.

### Step 4:
Import images as needed.

### Step 5:
Create pages based on your need and link them.

### Step 6:

Validate the HTML and CSS code.

### Step 6:

Publish the website in the given URL.

## DESIGN TOOL:
Figma

## CODE:
```
1.html
<link rel="stylesheet" href="1.css">
<div class="container--0-">
  <img
    src="data:image/jpeg;base64,"
  />
  <div class="text-0-1-1">SPORTS DAY EVENTS</div>
  <div class="text-0-1-2">
    CRICKET<br /><br />FOOTBALL<br /><br />VOLLEY BALL<br /><br />KABBADI<br /><br />KHO
    KHO<br /><br />BASKET BALL<br /><br />HOCKEY
  </div>
</div>

1.css

.container--0- {
  position: absolute;
  left: 289px;
  top: 24px;
  width: 393px;
  height: 852px;
  background-color: #ffffff;
  justify-content: start;
  align-items: start;
  border-radius: 10px;
  border-top-left-radius: 10px;
  border-top-right-radius: 10px;
  border-bottom-left-radius: 10px;
  border-bottom-right-radius: 10px;
}
.text-0-1-1 {
  width: 350px;
  height: 49px;
  color: #000000;
  font-size: 38px;
  font-family: JejuHallasan, "Regular";
  font-weight: 400;
  text-align: center;
  vertical-align: top;
}
.text-0-1-2 {
  width: 197px;
  height: 520px;
  color: #001f3f;
  font-size: 32px;
  font-family: Jaro, "Regular";
  font-weight: 400;
  text-align: left;
  vertical-align: top;
  
}

```

## RESULT:
The program to design, develop and deploy a web application for event registration is completed successfully.
